ALICEâ€™s main productÂ â€” ALICE SuiteÂ â€” brings together your front office, concierge, housekeeping, and maintenance teams, and connects your guests toÂ your hotel with our app and text messaging tools. The ALICE platform isÂ also available asÂ specialized software and mobile applications for your staff (ALICE Staff), your concierge (ALICE Concierge) and your guests (ALICE Guest). Each module can beÂ integrated with your PMS and third party management systems. ALICEâ€™s partners include 3-5 star independent and managed hotels, hotel groups, residential condominiums, serviced apartments, vacation rental companies, and concierge companies looking toÂ provide exceptional service through mobile staff technology and guest communication channels. Third-party service providers also leverage the ALICE API. ALICE was founded inÂ 2013 byÂ Justin Effron, Alex Shashou, and Dmitry Koltunov, and has raised $39M toÂ date.

description: The European Union Advisory Mission for Civilian Security Sector ReformÂ â€” Ukraine (EUAM-Ukraine).The European Union Advisory Mission (EUAM) Ukraine isÂ aÂ non-executive mission ofÂ the European Union that formally began operations from its headquarters inÂ Kyiv onÂ 1Â December 2014, following the Maidan revolution ofÂ 2013/14 and anÂ invitation issued byÂ the Ukrainian government. AÂ team ofÂ over 200 Ukrainian and international staff based principally inÂ KyivÂ â€” with aÂ presence also inÂ Lviv and Kharkiv from May 2016Â â€” deliver the EUAMÂ mandate, which isÂ implemented according toÂ three pillars ofÂ activity:a. Support for the implementation ofÂ reforms, through the delivery ofÂ hands-on advice, training and other projectsc. Cooperation and coordination, toÂ ensure that reform efforts are coordinated with Ukrainian and international actorsEUAM Ukraineâ€™s team ofÂ international advisors mainly come from Member States ofÂ the European Union, and they bring toÂ the Mission aÂ wealth ofÂ expertise inÂ security, police, judiciary, anti-corruption, human rights and public communication toÂ share with the Missionâ€™s Ukrainian counterparts, inÂ aÂ joint effort toÂ expedite the civilian security sector reform process. name: Nexar
description: Our mission isÂ toÂ create the technology that will make driving and cities better and safer.Nexar-powered dash cams enable new vision-based applications for better driving.When drivers pair Nexar-powered dash cams with the Nexar app, they join aÂ network that powers new applications for driving and seeing the world. Using anonymous, aggregated data captured from this network, Nexar has developed aÂ portfolio ofÂ vision-based data services for public and private sector partners toÂ make roadways safer and more efficient.Nexar was founded inÂ 2015 byÂ Eran Shir, aÂ serial entrepreneur, and Bruno Fernandez-Ruiz, formerly Senior Fellow atÂ Yahoo!. WeÂ are backed byÂ world-class investors with aÂ total fund ofÂ over $150M.WeÂ have offices inÂ Tel Aviv and NYC, and even aÂ small elite team based inÂ Ukraine, but our policy isÂ remote work first, which means you can apply and work forÂ us regardless ofÂ your physical location.WeÂ look forward toÂ hearing from you. Check out our open positions!
